document_data.name: Cheth Moonviper
document_data.mainbody: '''Cheth Moonviper''' was a balding alchemist in [[High Dale]].
document_data.History: Cheth was a priest of [[Bane]] and a scion of one of the most noble families of [[Zhentil Keep]]. Under orders of [[Fzoul Chembryl]], he settled in High Dale working as a physic, pharmacist, and tanner to the Dalesfolk. When in [[1358 DR]] a secret [[Zhent]] occupation army occupied the dale, Cheth was a member of the [[Council of the High Dale]].
